pages.text: Witchers can $(l:contracts/contracts#page_accept_contract)accept$() and $(l:contracts/contracts#page_exchange_contract)exchange$() various contracts to hunt $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_monsters)monsters$() and $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_non_humans)non-humans$() that the Villagers deem an issue from a $(l:crafting/contract_board#page_contract_board)Contract Board$(). These contracts will allow the Witcher to harvest $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophies$() from their targets, which they can deposit for $(l:contracts/rewards#page_rewards)rewards.$()

pages.title: Accepting Contracts
pages.text: When the Witcher is standing in range of a $(l:crafting/contract_board#page_contract_board)Contract Board$() and presses $(6)$(l)[$(k:saveToolbarActivator)]$() $(l)(Creative: Save Hotbar Activator)$() with an empty mainhand, they will accept a new contract to hunt a target. This ability has a cooldown of one full in-game day (24 mins), which will display on the HUD when the cooldown has five minutes remaining. This cannot be skipped or accelerated by sleeping.

pages.title: Exchanging Contracts
pages.text: While holding a contract in your mainhand in range of a $(l:crafting/contract_board#page_contract_board)Contract Board$(), press $(6)$(l)[$(k:saveToolbarActivator)]$() $(l)(Creative: Save Hotbar Activator)$() to exchange your contract for another of the same rarity. This ability has a cooldown of 5 minutes, which will display on the HUD when the cooldown has one minute remaining.

pages.title: The Sentinels
pages.text: A secondary method of obtaining a contract is through a new Villager profession: the Sentinel Villager. These watchful scouts are created by giving an unemployed Villager a $(l:crafting/contract_board#page_contract_board)Contract Board$() as their job block. Trading with these villagers will result in them offering Sentinel Reports, which can be redeemed by Witchers for contracts.
